byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: reptd in Belgrade that Brit warships halted Yugoslav ships in Adriatic; Ankara plans test run
snippet: BELGRADE, Yugoslavia, April 2 --It is reported here tonight without official confirmation that British warships have halted Yugoslav freighters somewhere in the Adriatic Sea....

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICA AND NEAR EAST AREAS

headline.main: SHIPS IN ADRIATIC REPORTED HALTED; British Said to Have Stopped Yugoslav Craft Carrying Bauxite to Italy

lead_paragraph: BELGRADE, Yugoslavia, April 2 --It is reported here tonight without official confirmation that British warships have halted Yugoslav freighters somewhere in the Adriatic Sea.
